##About Me

<br>

* I was born and raised in Edmonton, Alberta, Canada
* I got a bachelor's degree in paleontology from the University of Albera
* My friends and I discovered a dinosaur trackway out in the badlands of Alberta
* Currently, I am doing a PhD in Geological Sciences at Cornell University, specializing in Conservation Paleobiology
